Planning and Zoning Commission

Planning & Zoning Commission - reviews and approves subdivision plats, requests for specific use permits, and other zoning matters. The members are appointed by City Council and are resident volunteers from the City.

Planning & Zoning Commission Members are:
P&Z Position 1 Don Jones Chairman
P&Z Position 2 Buck Ballas Member
P&Z Position 3 Dana Gompers Member
P&Z Position 4 Bill Ogden Member
P&Z Position 5 Chris DeZevallos Member
P&Z Position 6 Jay Cohen Member
P&Z Position 7 Tim Jones Member

  • Planning & Zoning Plat Application
  • Plat Help Sheet
  • (Copy of Chapter 50) Procedure for Submission Plats
  • Tax Certificate Request Form
2026 Planning & Zoning Commission Schedule
 
Secretary for the Commission Annette R. Arriaga   
 
All of Piney Point Village is Zoned as Single Family, (No Commercial) SF1
